Performer:
Takezawa Danroku VIII (see also Tsuruzawa Kanji VII) (竹沢団六 (八))

Alternate Name: Tsuruzawa Kanji VII (鶴澤寛治 (七))

Dates: '1956/01-2001/01'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
